name: Afifa Iskandar
description:
'''Afifa Iskandar Estefan'''  ({{langx|ar|عفيفة إسكندر إصطيفان}}, 10 December 1921 – 21 October 2012) was an [[Iraqi people|Iraqi]] singer and actress, active from the mid-1930s to the first decade of the 21st century. 

She was considered one of the best female singers in Iraqi history. She was nicknamed the "Iraqi Blackbird".
